title: NASA Johnson Honors Hispanic Heritage: Meet Manuel Retana
summary: Manuel Retana arrived in the U.S. at 15 years old, unable to speak English and with nothing but a dream and $200 in his pocket. Now, he plays a crucial role implementing life support systems on spacecraft that will carry humans to the Moon and, eventually, Mars—paving the way for the next frontier of space […]

title: Apex unveils larger satellite bus
summary: Satellite manufacturer Apex formally rolled out a larger satellite bus that the company says is geared for more demanding missions from government customers.

title: NGSO revenue to overtake geostationary market by 2028
summary: Constellations in non-geostationary orbit are set to overtake geostationary satellites in revenue by 2028, according to Novaspace research published Sept. 15.
